name: The Journey Begins
description:
Welcome to my first Game Jam game, The Journey Begins.

A mysterious message from you sister asked you to reach the cliff. Understand the world that surrounds you and pass through puzzles and challenges. Will you succed to reach the end?

Theme : Family

Wildcards used : none

Apart from the sound effects and the font every piece of the games has been made by me, without any reutilisation from another project

                                                                     

Do not hesitate to give me feedbacks ^^
